name: A Night With Neil
description:
"A Night With Neil" is the first in, hopefully, a series of choose-your-own-adventure text games done in Twine focusing on my various characters. Hang out with Neil! Get banged by Neil! Get ate by Neil!

Features:
- 23,000+ words of lewd content
- 12 different endings
- Oral/Anal/Cock/Navel/Sheath vore, facesitting, feeding, m/player sex, underwear TF (same-size)
- Oral/Anal vore (macro/micro)
- Hot deer
